title: Their Sinner
description:
Everyone has a weakness, Lucie just happens to have four. Lucie 'Lucifer' Steeler was born a sinner.The Princess of the Hell's Rebels' MC, she was made to raise hell, and in true hellion style, lived to her own creed. A creed that involved falling for five brothers in her daddy's MC.Her rebellion lasted until the day her world came tumbling down, and she was exiled from everything she knew. In the blink of an eye, the MC was gone, her home was gone, but worst of all?
The men she loved believed her a traitor.

Now she's back, with a daughter they don't know about, and a plan to retrieve the life that was stolen from her.Tired of sinning on her own, Lucie's ready to become THEIR SINNER. And she won't be taking 'no' for an answer...
THEIR SINNER is a standalone Why Choose, MC Romance within the complete 'Hell's Rebels' MC' series and is followed by THEIR SAINT.
author: Serena Akeroyd
